languages.text: {n}Справиться с древним замком оказывается не так уж и легко. Промаявшись с цилиндровым механизмом, вы просто бросаете это безнадежное занятие.{/n}
{n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Справиться с древним замком оказывается не так уж и легко. Промаявшись с цилиндровым механизмом, вы просто бросаете это безнадежное занятие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老旧的笼锁比你想象得更难缠，你和它的锁簧机构斗争了很长时间，最终放弃了徒劳的尝试。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老旧的笼锁比你想象得更难缠，你和它的锁簧机构斗争了很长时间，最终放弃了徒劳的尝试。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La anticuada cerradura resulta más compleja de lo que esperabas. Te debates con el cilindro durante un largo rato hasta que por fin desistes y das la tarea por imposible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La anticuada cerradura resulta más compleja de lo que esperabas. Te debates con el cilindro durante un largo rato hasta que por fin desistes y das la tarea por imposible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antika kilit, sandığından daha zorlu çıkıyor. Silindir şeklindeki mekanizmayla uzun süre boğuşup sonrasında umutsuz çabalarına bir son veriyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antika kilit, sandığından daha zorlu çıkıyor. Silindir şeklindeki mekanizmayla uzun süre boğuşup sonrasında umutsuz çabalarına bir son veriyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その旧式な南京錠は考えていたよりも複雑なことが分かる。しばらくその機序と悪戦苦闘した後、望みのない挑戦をやめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その旧式な技術は考えていたよりも複雑なことが分かる。しばらくそのエネルギーリレーと悪戦苦闘した後、望みのない挑戦をやめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ce verrou d'une autre époque s'avère plus difficile à manipuler que vous ne le pensiez. Vous luttez longuement avec le mécanisme cylindrique, mais finissez par abandonner la partie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ce verrou d'une autre époque s'avère plus difficile à manipuler que vous ne le pensiez. Vous luttez longuement avec le mécanisme cylindrique, mais finissez par abandonner la partie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das antiquierte Schloss erweist sich als unerwartet große Herausforderung. Du kämpfst lange mit seinem zylindrischen Mechanismus, bevor du das hoffnungslose Unterfangen schließlich aufgibst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The antiquated lock proves more of a challenge than you thought. You struggle with its cylindrical mechanism for a long while before abandoning your hopeless endeavour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das antiquierte Schloss erweist sich als unerwartet große Herausforderung. Du kämpfst lange mit seinem zylindrischen Mechanismus, bevor du das hoffnungslose Unterfangen schließlich aufgibst.{/n}
